author: jorton
msg: - add need_php4 to work with either sapi_apache2.c or mod_php4.c
- adjust all the tests to use need_php4 to be PHP SAPI-agnostic.

author: jorton
msg: The PHP module should now always have the correct name in ->{modules}.

author: jorton
msg: Generate PHP_MODULE correctly for PHP 4.x on httpd-2.x.  Tested to
not break PHP 5.x on 2.x also but no other combinations.

author: jorton
msg: Use need_ rather than have_ in plan.
